FuncDef: The display acl ipv6 command can view information about the rules of a specified ACL6 or of all ACL6s and packet matching statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an ACL6.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the number of an ACL6.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 2999. The number of a basic ACL6 ranges from 2000 to 2999.

Specifies the number of an ACL6.
The value is an integer ranging from 3000 to 3999. The number of an advanced ACL6 ranges from 3000 to 3999.

ExtraInfo: You can run the display acl ipv6 command for the following purposes:
